The Eldritch Knight gains spells known at different levels either from the EK spell list (Evo and Abj spells only) at levels 3, 4, 7,10,11 and the Wizard (Expanded; Any spell school) spell list at levels 3 and 8. You can't learn spells from scrolls, but you can use the scrolls to cast spells to maximize Eldritch Strike.
